website_summaries.verdict: A popular, durable choice. Nylon two-board bag with room plus compartment for your fins.
pros: Shoulder straps can be used as a backpack or over the shoulder
Two roomy pockets for beach gear
cons: Zippers broke for some customers, although for others this bag has held up great

customer_reviews.title: Good bodyboard bag.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag for the price. Most of the local stores (I live on the Emerald Cost of Florida) charge around 40 dollars or more for a decent bodyboard bag. This bag is very sturdy, has room for at least 2 bodyboards, and a good pocket in the front for my blunt cut fins. If you need a good bag to transport your boards and other goods too and from the beach, while protecting your boards from the sun when not in use, then this is a great bag.
customer_reviews.author: Adam W.

customer_reviews.title: Not super durable but about what you would expect at this ...
customer_reviews.text: Not super durable but about what you would expect at this price point. My first bag fell apart after one use but it was quickly replaced. Second bag seems to be holding up just as expected but if it doesn't, I have great confidence in the seller to make it right.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fruehe

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bag!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is absolutely awesome! If you are looking for a bodyboard bag this is the one to get! Although it may not be seen in pictures it actually has: A shoulder strap, Carry handle, and backpacking straps. Also there are two pockets in the front of the bag big enough to fit anything you could need for the beach (maybe not an umbrella).
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for price, no problems
customer_reviews.text: I'm a picky consumer. For the money, this is awesome. No trouble with zippers, seams. I haven't tried overloading it and picking it up by one strap to test the strength. With 2 bodyboards, 2 sets of fins and a few other things it's been great and plenty large. I've had it 1 1/2 years, not heavily used.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Rose

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected, Nice Surprise!
customer_reviews.text: It holds three 42 inch boards if you aren't carrying anything else in it. Great for beach travel
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This bag had a ton of room. We put two boogie boards, 4 snorkels, beach toys, and towels with room to spare. It also went on the airplane without a oversize charge. So far it seams fairly sturdy. There is extra pockets to keep your items seporate which helps keep sand off of your valuables.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C

customer_reviews.title: Just ok!
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the price I guess. Definetly, not for international travel! The straps came off and the zipper got stuck several times.
customer_reviews.author: JArauz

customer_reviews.title: You can put three body board in it... tight fit.
customer_reviews.text: Brought this to Hawaii trip and stuffed three body board in it. Made the round trip and still in good shape. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Van Lam

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you're a bodyboarder
customer_reviews.text: I can fit two bodyboard, a skim board, my fins, a towel and I still have extra room for it. The best part that the fin/towel pocket has a net bottom so that the sand doesn't collect in your bag. Its great quality and relatively cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is good for travel I used to take my board and other gear to a couple different countries and beaches. Nice bag to put all your gear (Board, Fins, Towel, Rash Shirt, Sun Block, things like that) all in one place and just carry to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: jray211

customer_reviews.title: works great for chairs or boogy boards
customer_reviews.text: great for traveling on the plane, we take our boogy boards and beach chairs in these bags to florida every year, straps a bit flimsy
customer_reviews.author: AMF

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, Convenient, Great Board Bag
customer_reviews.text: We fit 2 boards in it, with room to spare for a beach umbrella. Big pocket holds towel and shirt. Would definitely buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: rariti

customer_reviews.title: It works, but just don't expect anything more.
customer_reviews.text: Can fit two decent size boards, decent quality, adequate zippers.
customer_reviews.author: Gedalneil

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: Held up quite well on five hour flight with two boogie boards inside. Okay to carry for a tall person. Convenient to lug things to the beach in.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Bray

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and did the job
customer_reviews.text: Used the bag to travel to Kauai. It fit two boards, fins and rash guards. Sturdy and did the job. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: BA Moore

customer_reviews.title: Tore at seams first use.
customer_reviews.text: I chose this bag because it was a BZ bag...for a BZ board. It ripped in two places the first time we used it. Tears way too easily!
customer_reviews.author: K. Nichol

customer_reviews.title: Defective Zipper on this bag....will not hold
customer_reviews.text: This bag would be great in terms of its functional purpose if it had a more sturdy zipper, but without improving the quality there, the bag is useless.When I received the first product, before I even was able to use the bag the zipper on the top broke (came off the tracks). I called Amazon and they replaced the bag without any issue. The second bag had the exact same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Perrotta

customer_reviews.title: This bag is horrible, it ripped on day one with minimal use
customer_reviews.text: This bag is horrible, it ripped on day one with minimal use. If I could give it negative stars I would Do not purchase
customer_reviews.author: Heather Sittig

customer_reviews.title: I should have read the description better. I ended up returning this bag
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the description better. I ended up returning this bag. I am looking for something more substantial with padded back pack straps.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: just what was needed!
customer_reviews.text: .....now my son can carry his own board and offers to carry his sister's too! He is even able to ise it on his bike! Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Bozzi

customer_reviews.title: So far it's holding up great.
customer_reviews.text: Got 3 boards in the bag. So far it's holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A.

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Used it three times in a week and the strap came off...piece of junk. Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Fare

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: This bag worked great. Easily held three boards, three towels, my flip=flops, and the outside pocket held our huge towel we use to lay on beach. Great bag, easy handles, good shoulder strap. Plenty big. Material is good for flights. Went on four different flights. If you need a bag for a trip a couple of times a year, this is the bag. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Hager

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bag! Plenty of zippered compartments
customer_reviews.text: The perfect bag ! Plenty of zippered compartments, carrying straps ( handle, backpack and over shoulder ). Durable material, great price. This bag has it all !
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Okay but no netting on bottom of bag to drain the sand
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Holds 3 boards. Seems well made and durable. Easy to clean.I really like the big shoulder strap (Usually I am carrying a lot of stuff down to the beach). Only real negative is that I believe it is overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: External zipper broke the first time I used it as check-in luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beach board bag
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used this bag all summer for surf camp - it is the perfect size for a boogie board (or two), wetsuit, snorkel set, towel and lunch box. Sturdy enough for the whole summer and easy to use with both shoulder straps.
customer_reviews.author: E S

customer_reviews.title: Congratulations
customer_reviews.text: Excelent 100%. I really like the product, quality, fast shipment, price. Great Dealer. Congratulations. I'm very happy, attended my expectations.Cesar
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Ive flewn all across the country with this bag. ...
customer_reviews.text: Ive flewn all across the country with this bag. Very durable! Plenty of room for fins and even a large towel
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage
customer_reviews.text: Piece of trash cant hold one board and a wetsuit apparently, broke on first day i used it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

product_meta.title: Wham-O BZ Basic Boogie and Body Board Bag with Straps and compartments
product_meta.description:
A fantastic Nylon Body board or Boogie Board Bag with fin compartment is super durable and can fit two boards, perfect for saving space while traveling. The BZ Body Board Bag can carry two full size body boards with room to spare making it a great value for the price. Carry your body board, protect them from the sun or from being damaged. Plus, the fin compartment makes the BZ Body Board bag an economical bag. The Padded durable shoulder straps make carrying your body or boogie boards easy; use it as a backpack or over the shoulder. The zippered compartment has room for find for fins and other gear: towels, clothes and more, making the BZ Nylon Body Board Bag the ultimate carrying bag. From the world famous American toy company Wham-O, the makers of the Frisbee, Hula-Hoop and the Superball.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER

The zippered compartment has room for find for fins and other gear: towels, clothes and more, making the BZ Nylon Body Board Bag the ultimate carrying bag. From the world famous American toy company Wham-O, the makers of the Frisbee, Hula-Hoop and the Superball.
